taggyDescription.description: Find the right text for your posts based on the content of your photo and increase the visibility of your content on social networks.
taggyDescription.WhatCanyouDo: What can you do with Taggy?
taggyDescription.WhatCanyouDoText1: Generate custom captions and quotes based on the content of your photo. You can add or remove hashtags and generate new texts.
taggyDescription.WhatCanyouDoText2: Easily copy the text with the hashtags and use them in your publication.
taggyDescription.WhatCanyouDoText3: Edit and download your optimized photo adapted for social networks.
taggyDescription.HowDoesItWorksText1: We use AI to detect and rank the keywords in your photo, and then convert them into SEO-optimized text, themes, and hashtags.
